However, the webpage for the electricity bill did not provide direct access to the bill amount, as it requires entering an email address and possibly further interaction with the webpage.

To proceed, I'll fill out the form on the electricity website using your email to obtain the bill. After retrieving the bill, I can then calculate the amount available for transfer.
